thread.title: Win a Weber Genesis® barbecue worth £1,119.99
thread.title_full: Win a Weber Genesis® barbecue worth £1,119.99 - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Win a Weber Genesis® barbecue worth £1,119.99
text: To celebrate our exclusive booklets, The Ultimate Barbecue Recipes, free inside the newspaper on Saturday, August 15 & Sunday, August 16, we have teamed up with Weber to offer one lucky Telegraph reader a Weber Genesis® barbecue, worth £1,119.99. Plus - 10 runners-up will win the book Weber's Burgers, Sausages & More: Over 160 Barbecue Favourites by Jamie Purviance, worth £14.99. This classic, highly acclaimed Weber® gas barbecue is perfect for creating simply brilliant barbecued food. The Genesis® E-310 comes fully equipped with front mounted control knobs, porcelain-enamelled cast iron cooking grates, and porcelain-enamelled Flavorizer® bars for the perfect barbecue taste. The Genesis® E-310 comes with : - 10 year limited warranty. - Front mounted control knobs. - 3 stainless steel burners. - 38,000 BTU per hour input (11.1kW/h). - Porcelain-enamelled cast iron cooking grates. - Flavorizer® bars provide the perfect barbecue taste. - Electronic ignition. - Built-in thermometer. - 6 tool holders. - 2 stainless steel worktops. - 2 fixed and 2 lockable castors More about Weber's Burgers, Sausages & More: Over 160 Barbecue Favourites: From the world's leading authority on grilling, Weber's Big Book of Burgers goes beyond the bun with over 80 inventive burger recipes, from the Four-Alarm Jalapeño Cheeseburgers to the Smoked Chicken Burgers with Bacon and Blue Cheese. Whether you're craving beef, pork, lamb, poultry or seafood, or want to go completely meatless, you're guaranteed to find a burger for you. You'll also find recipes for sizzling sausages, brats hot dogs, sides, and drinks to serve alongside. How to enter: To enter, simply fill in the form below. Online Form - Win a Weber Genesis® barbecue worth £1,119.99 telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegraph
